title: Abandoned Military Base
briefDescription: On a tropical island in the middle of the vast ocean, there was once a top-secret military installation. However, it was abandoned and overrun by ...

crawledImageUrls.text: On a tropical island in the middle of the vast ocean, there was once a top-secret military installation. However, it was abandoned and overrun by the natives, falling into ruin. Download this map, and explore the secrets within.
Featuring a village, built over the ruins of the base!
Ocean view!

title: The Hilltop Castle
briefDescription: This is another castle made my me that's inspired by the mythical sausage. This castle has many features that's required in a castle. The block ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is another castle made my me that?s inspired by the mythical sausage. This castle has many features that?s required in a castle. The block palate is the white washed stone type with brick red roof, it really is a nice combination.

title: Top 10 Traps
briefDescription: You want to troll your friends but don't have good ideas? Then you're right here. In this map there are 10 Cool Traps and all can ...

crawledImageUrls.text: You want to troll your friends but don?t have good ideas? Then you?re right here. In this map there are 10 Cool Traps and all can be built in survival. Share this map with you friends for more maps.
One of my favorite is the Quicksand. It?s easy to make and you almost don?t realize it?s quicksand.
There are 10 traps. Some are easy to make like quicksand and some are rather heavy.
For example, the Minecart Trap is rather difficult to make because you also need a lot of resources.
And some traps are rather annoying like this one. You can?t escape, but you can destroy the pistons. xD

title: 2 Parks Cedar Camp Resort Final 2020 Update
briefDescription: Cedar Camp is a Fictional Cedar Fair Park I created. Inspired of my 5 favorite theme Parks Cedar Point Knott's Berry Farm Dorney Park King's Dominion ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Cedar Camp is a Fictional Cedar Fair Park I created. Inspired of my 5 favorite theme Parks Cedar Point Knott?s Berry Farm Dorney Park King?s Dominion and Six Flags Magic Mountain. The Park Features 30 (17 Cedar Camp)(2 in the Upcoming Park Knott?s Gold and More) (10 Soak City and Galactic Adventures) Coasters with pixelated realistic appearances and the rides are ridable except carnival flat rides Just 99% of Rollercoasters Scenic/Dark Rides and Water Rides. Some Flat Rides are ridable that contain tracks in them. Looping Coasters don?t actually invert but you can always simulate with the right joystick or mouse with the movements but the inversions are also for decoration and scenery. It took me 11 months to this current state of progress.

30 Rollercoasters 17(Cedar Camp) 10(Soak City and Galactic Adventures)
Over 8 Water Rides
Realistic Looking.
Tracked Rides are Ridable
Camp Snoopy
New Park: Soak City and Suburb Adventures
Keep a heads up with my updates don?t expect them too instantly since its done on my Nintendo Switch Since that?s the console Im always on. The updates are slow because of budget cuts and no by the progress im in.
Cedar Camp Rollercoasters:
Adrenaline Rush(Intamin Strata Coaster)
(HURRICANE HAS BEEN RELOCATED)
Sunburst(B&M Floorless Looping)
Sierra Sidewinder(Mack Spin Coaster)

VOLCANO: Lava Flight(B&M Wing 4-D Coaster)
The Venom 300(Intamin Giga Coaster)
The Mamba(B&M Hyper Coaster)
The Niagara Falls(Mack Water Coaster)
New* Poltegist Revenge(Mack Multi Launch Loop Coaster)
Soak City And Galactic Adventures Park(2nd Park):
Kamikaze(RMC Raptor)
Saturn(Vekoma SLC Inverted Coaster)
Woodan Timbur(Dinn Corporation Wooden Coaster)
Jupiter Storm(Schwarzkoph Looper)

Chaos Flight(Vekoma Suspended Swing Coaster)
Rocket Express(Zamperla Wild Mouse)
Sky Rocket(Premier Rides Sky Rocket II)
Skywarp(Skyline Attractions Skywarp)
Aqualoop(Mack Power Splash with Loop)
Knott?s Golf and More(3rd Park 2021)
Wind Jammer Surf Racers(TOGO Crazy Mouse)
Soapbox Derby Racers(Arrow Racing Horse)

This is an accurate recreation of Titanic real life sized (270?29 blocks) .
I might update with interiors, I made a simple grand staircaise for now.
Sorry for the lack of portholes in the hull.
Please do not reupload. The map will also be uploaded in Minecraft Java Edition.

title: FunPark! ? A Minecraft Amusement Park
briefDescription: Have you ever wanted to visit an amusement park in Minecraft? Well, now there is a way! Featuring 5 unique coasters, you can tour this amusement ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wanted to visit an amusement park in Minecraft? Well, now there is a way! Featuring 5 unique coasters, you can tour this amusement park with your friends.
This map features a multitude of rides. As my first map (don?t judge), I attempted to create a ?theme park? feel in Minecraft, complete with villagers riding the roller coasters. Don?t worry, you can ride them too (pictured below: Dragon Flight coaster)!
There are rides for everyone!
There is also a brand new waterpark area!

title: Boardwalk
briefDescription: Have you ever longed to visit a beach? Well, I created this virtual beach and boardwalk full of fun activities. While it is no substitute ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever longed to visit a beach? Well, I created this virtual beach and boardwalk full of fun activities. While it is no substitute for a real one, I hope that this map is still a fun experience!
Stroll down the boardwalk!
Or, lounge on the beach!
You can even visit a small waterpark!

title: Ghostbusters: The Map
briefDescription: Ghostbusters Map it is the closest I could get to the game from 2008 it has memorable locations like Ray's occult from From Ghostbusters 2, Ecto 1 from ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Ghostbusters Map it is the closest I could get to the game from 2008 it has memorable locations like Ray?s occult from From Ghostbusters 2, Ecto 1 from the game and some secrets I plan to update it as I make it but coming soon hopefully is The Sedgewick Hotel, Shandor Island and other locations like the University that the Ghostbusters went to, and The Art Museum where Vego was placed all in this map
Ghostbusters Map it is the closest I could get to the game but it is not completely accurate but for the most part it includes Ghostbusters HQ, Ray?s occult, and surrounding buildings which not build inside there is also Ecto 1 and the containment Grid and other references to Ghostbusters around the map ex. Slimer?s Containment, Vego as pictured in the game, Jeanne?s desk, all as close as I could get them to the game and or Movie, I plan on having most if not all of the Ghostbusters Landmarks that I can make so stay tuned Link to my YouTube if you want to see the progress of the map!:
If you have any suggestions just comment on my channel or would like to help! I?m going to try to update the map bi-weekly and you can see more updates on my channel you can also request things for me to make on the map there!
You May Not
? Upload this to any other site other than ones I am on
? Upload a changed version
? Claim this as yours

title: Towns : Roleplay Preset
briefDescription: Ever wanted to roleplay with your friends on a small area where everyone is close? Ever wanted to make your own towns and cities but ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Ever wanted to roleplay with your friends on a small area where everyone is close? Ever wanted to make your own towns and cities but never have the time to start them up? Well look no further! This small preset is here to help!
It will also have a few updated with more towns and cities as time goes on!

title: Simple Survival Cabins
briefDescription: Don't want to start a survival world with nothing? Don't like building bases? Well, do I have a world for you! Simple Survival Cabins includes ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Don?t want to start a survival world with nothing? Don?t like building bases? Well, do I have a world for you! Simple Survival Cabins includes a main base with all the basic necessities and more!
Simple Survival Includes:
-A main house with multiple furnaces, all tools, a full set of leather armour, a bed, a double chest, a single chest on the second floor, and some other special resources.
-A storage house that has four double chests.
-A dock connected to a nearby river with a boat.
-A nearby village.
Here are some photos of the world:
The first floor of the main house:
The second floor of the main house:
The storage house:
The inside of the stroage house:
The docks connected to the river:
There is a village not to far just across the river:

title: Tropical Island
briefDescription: This map features a beautiful tropical island for exploration and customization! It can be used for many purposes and includes some pre-built structures and scenery. ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This map features a beautiful tropical island for exploration and customization! It can be used for many purposes and includes some pre-built structures and scenery. You can lounge in the sun, or take a (pretend) zipline ride!
Somewhere on this island, you can find a key in order to get a reward from the vending machine, also located on the island!

title: Queen International Airport (with Airplanes)
briefDescription: This a world that I have made over the past while that includes a main airport named after Queen the band and a secondary airport. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This a world that I have made over the past while that includes a main airport named after Queen the band and a secondary airport. This is my first MCPEDL creation so it might not be really good.
Anyways I hope you enjoy this map!
This is a map that I had a really fun time making. First of all you start of in the plane runway.
Then you go to the terminal entrances which gives you the instructions of what to do when you land the plane(s).
Then you go into the doors and through it and you end up in the waiting area where their is flight attendants wating for your flight to arrive
You then go into the food court where it includes McDonalds, Taco Bell, and Dunkin?Donuts
This is a picture of Dunkin Donuts
This is a picture of the mens room

title: Battle of Hoth Recreated
briefDescription: Hello, my name is Zaidan, and this is my first map ever on Minecraft Bedrock! This is the Battle of Hoth, from Star Wars: The ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hello, my name is Zaidan, and this is my first map ever on Minecraft Bedrock! This is the Battle of Hoth, from Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back. This battlefield contains aircraft, speeders, and so much more!
Also, I give credit to the texture pack and shaders that decorated my world. Thank you!
Texture Pack: https://mcpedl.com/multipixel-texture-pack/
Shaders: https://mcpedl.com/esbe-2g/
Don?t forget to credit me when you?re using this world for reviewing on YouTube. I hope you enjoy the map!
This map has Imperial Walkers, Rebel Snowspeeders, and much more. Plus, you can even enter the interior of any vehicle you find. Amazing!
This is Echo Base, the main rebel base in Planet Hoth.
Imperial walkers invading the base.

title: The Five Nights at Freddy?s 4 House Re-Created
briefDescription: This is a recreation of the house in the game Five Nights at Freddy?s 4. I will add custom textures in the next update (with ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is a recreation of the house in the game Five Nights at Freddy?s 4. I will add custom textures in the next update (with custom textures I mean I will make custom textures for the animatronics too) so stay tuned for that!

* The two hallways (the left hallway has the pendulum clock at the end)
* The Kitchen (added in later update)
* Plushtrap hallway
* TV Room (End of left hallway)
* Closet
* Bed
* Doors
* Flashlight (added in later update)
This map has no Addons or texture packs.
I have made custom skins for Roleplay (since this is a Roleplay map) but no actual Animatronics though.

briefDescription: This map contains 2 very detailed, functional houses. Use them for inspiration, or move into one, the choice is yours. Each house took me approximately 6-10 ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map contains 2 very detailed, functional houses. Use them for inspiration, or move into one, the choice is yours. Each house took me approximately 6-10 hrs each to build. Download today and be inspired to build your own house just like this! I plan on expanding this into a whole village, so look forward to that!

title: Star Trek USS Enterprise Refit
briefDescription: For those lovers of the original Star Trek movies, comes the Enterprise. By downloading this map, you will be going on a continuing mission, to ...

crawledImageUrls.text: For those lovers of the original Star Trek movies, comes the Enterprise. By downloading this map, you will be going on a continuing mission, to where no one has gone before!
Explore this 22 decked ship, with many iconic places to visit. Starting from the top: it the bridge!

With the captain?s chair, In the middle of the bridge, this iconic room takes meaning.
Second is the dining areas:
great places to view the back of ship! Deck 3 is filled with these!
Then Down to deck 15 main engineering! In the Conner you will come across the dilithium chamber, where Spock dies in Star Trek 2.
And finally down to the shuttle bay. Here there are many shuttles lined up for you to explore!
Other place if interest are the captains ready room, a gym to have hours of exercise in, endless corridors, and 3 custom ships.
This is a great map ?
